This is so damn short, in fact, I completed it in under an hour, but it's still loads of fun like Downfall ;). This is a little scenario where you must vanquish the terror of St. Olga, a persistent Headcrab Canister Launcher implemented by the Combine. There are a good few Combine soldiers to fight through, as well as beautiful environments, great level design and a hunter chopper. Thumbs up here :D.

Half-Life 2: Lost Coast to demo technologiczne dla ówcześnie tworzonej technologii High Dynamic Range (HDR). Fabuła jest prosta i niekanoniczna - budzimy się na Zagubionym Wybrzeżu, gdzie spotykamy rybaka. Wie on, kim jesteśmy, dlatego wysyła nas na misję pokonania oddziału Kombinatu, który tutaj stacjonuje. Ta okraszona komentarzem twórców gra wystarcza na ok. 30 minut.

      PLUSY

...

      MINUSY

- poza benchmarkiem i krótką rozgrywką nie nadaje się ona do niczego (chyba, że masz Garry's Mod).

      WERDYKT

       Lost Coast to demo technologiczne HDR. I nic więcej.

       2/10

One of those 'can't believe I still haven't played this' kind of deals. But don't fret, it is literally just a cut Half Life 2 chapter that takes about 15 minutes to finish and has all your favourite HL mechanics and features on display - cliffside walks, physics, headcrabs, more physics and a helicopter battle. Indeed, had this been left in, it probably would've been one of the shortest chapters in the original game. 

People have said it makes for a cool fevre dream-style moment for Dr Freeman in the canon, going by the ending. Said it's best to load up after you get the crossbow for the first time. Been a while since I played HL2 but when I replay it (and will probably be soon because I need my good FPS fix now and then like a favourite chocolate bar) I'll make sure to splice it in with the main game. 

9/10 (only because it's Half Life, was free and should be counted as part of HL2 itself)
El primer juego que puso a prueba una tecnologia que revoluciono los videojuegos

《半条命 2：消失的海岸线》是 V社用来展示 Source 引擎新技术的一个关卡，听说这个关卡是半条命2主线的一个部分，游戏的画面放到现在也是相当的惊艳，尤其是水面的效果做的相当的逼真，期间还有开发人员对新技术的详细解说，关卡长度大约在30分钟左右吧，属于一个非常精致的小甜点，V社的游戏品质是没得说的，建议大家玩一下，非常不错的。

The shiny water is pretty.

This is not a long game. Someone looking for a continuation of Half-Life 2 is going to be disappointed. Lost Coast is just an interesting look at what the Source engine is capable of.

Honestly, I have no idea why I got this game. It is a good challenge, but is extremely buggy, and it's real reason is to tell you how Valve produced Half-Life 2. It has a game- breaking glitch right at the start where if you go onto the rocks behind the gate into the cliffside, the fisherman won't open the gate. I honestly don't recommend it, but if you are a Half- Life superfan, go ahead, waste your money.

Desperate for a HL2 fix? Sadly, "Lost Coast" can't scratch that itch. In fact, it'll only make it worse. It will give you 15 or so minutes of great fun and serve as a reminder for why we're so sad that we'll never see Episode 3. It's especially teasing, given that it's... you know... on a coast.

What's fantastic about "Lost Coast" is the developer commentary. Seriously, it's kind of neat to hear the thoughts of the devs on an incomplete level. SInce it's free and you can make multiple playthroughs in less than a hour, why not take a look?

tylko 1 rozdział który jest strasznie trudny no ale początek nie jest.Half-Life 2 Lost Coast też
jak inne gry ma zalety i wady i teraz do nich przejdziemy.
Zalety:
+Można ją dostać za darmo gdy się kupi Half-Life 2
+Mało waży
+Są nowe postacie
+Są podpowiedzi.
Wady:
-Krótka
-Można wejść do pokoju w którym nic nie ma ciekawego i potem nie można z niego wyjść.
Moja ocena Half-Life 2 Lost Coast to 6/10

To say I was disappointed would not be far from the truth. Once the fight starts, you think, all right, where will this take us? Only to realize that that single fight up the hill and in the site is the ONLY fight in the game and, really, the only part of this game. If it never was added to the original half-life 2, it was because it had nothing to add to the story and we never should have received it. Great art as always but terribly short with no true satisfaction to gain from playing it.

No sé cómo este título acabó en mi biblioteca pero aquí estoy haciéndole un análisis.
Tal cómo dice la descripción en su página de la tienda, es una sección eliminada del capítulo Autopista 17 (Uno de los mejores capítulos del juego).
Por lo tanto, es cortísimo. Dura alrededor de unos 15 minutos pero es suficiente para probar como funciona el HDR y escuchar los comentarios de los desarrolladores.
Básicamente te muestra cómo corre el motor Source incorporando HDR.
Sí, ese HDR que están vendiendote en consolas ahora en 2018 pero con el que Valve ya desarrollaba en 2004.
Volviendo al juego, debes destruir una máquina que enviaba los cangrejos (O Headcrab) en mísiles a un pueblo costero.
No esperes mucho más que una demo de HDR.
Ушло 18 минут, не спешно всё рассматривая ждём продолжение
It is good but very short only 20min

Half Life 2 Lost Coast ist eine spielbare Demoversion deren Source-Engine um HDR (High Dynamic Range) erweitert wurde. Diese kostenlose Demo zeigt die fantastischen neuen Möglichkeiten der verbesserten Engine.
very great game but it is very short

A nice short 10-20 minute Demo with a 2 combine fights and a fairly easy heli fight, turn on the comentry to understand the new graphics system, and see what the developers have to say, useful also if your interseted in developing, they explain Arenas, and other gamplay mechanics, with the comentry on, i found this as an educational but fun demo that can be played multipule times.
